descriptionHtml:
[center][size=+1]This is my first mod, so please be patient with me. 
\"It\'s my first day\" H. Simpson [/center][/size]

[center][color=RED][size=+2]Ugluch - The Orc Imperial Officer[/size][/center][/color]

[size=+1]This mod adds a new follower, an Imperial Orc Officer. He\'s at level 35 and use principally two imperial swords, but he have also an imperial bow. 

[center][IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot59_zps8ae40353.png[/IMG][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot62_zpsa9d97724.png[/IMG][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot61_zpsc4c0d462.png[/IMG][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot63_zps3d978a2a.png[/IMG][/center]

[center]You can find him in Castle Dour, Solitude.[/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot64_zpse164f906.png[/IMG][/center]

If you want this character like my images, see in the \"credits\" section all mods that you need.
Please endorse their works if you use.

[center]Otherwise the character will be this:[/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/UglochSimple_zpsd24dcea2.jpg[/IMG][/center]

Installation:

Simply extract the .esp file in your \"Data\" folder.


Thanks to:

Apachii for \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]\"

Chris57 for \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces[/url]
\"

Xenius for \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498]High Quality Eyes[/url]\", \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/256]Detailed Bodies[/url]\", \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26]Detailed Faces v2[/url]\", \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21082]XCE - Brows[/url]\", \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24600]XCE - Scarface[/url]\" and \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]\"

uglydemon for \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/334]SEAMLESS cleaner Male Skin[/url]\"

83Willow for \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11371]83Willows WHITER TEETH 4all - Orc Khajiit Argonian Werewolf[/url]\"

Ali Bengali for \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6085]Perfect Legionnaire - Imperial Armor Reforged 4-0[/url]\"

lthot for \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363]Beards[/url]\"

Andrea[/size]
author: Andre7890
